name: SupplierLocation_GetLocationBybAccountIdlocationId
description: Get a specific Location of a Baccount

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$block: This class represents a Location in LocationController. Used for getting data.

$ul: **active**: The top part > Active > A check box that you select if the location is active.
**address**: General information tab > Location address section >
**addressLine1**: Address 1 > The first line of the customer's/supplier's/company's/employee's contact address.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line of the address.
**addressLine3**: Address 3 > The third line of the address.
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**baccount**: Mandatory field: The top part > Business connection* > The business account this location is associated with. Click the magnifier.
**name**: The name of the particular destination of the selected type.
**number**: The identifier of the particular destination of the selected type.
**contact**: General information tab > Location contact section >

**attention**: Attention > The attention line as it is used in your customer's/supplier's/company's business letters. The intention of this line is to direct the letter to the right person if the letter is not addressed to any specific person.
**email**: Email > The email address of the customer/supplier/company as a business entity.
**name**: Name > The legal name of to appear on the documents.
**web**: Web > The website of the company, if one exists.
**corporateId**: General information tab > Location address section > Corporate ID > The corporate ID associated with the customer location.
**ediCode**: General information tab > Location address section > EDI code > The EDI code to be used for the customer location.
**gln**: General information tab > Location address section > GLN > The GLN to be used for the customer location.
**locationId**: Mandatory field: The top part > Location ID* > The identifier of the location. Click the magnifier.
**locationName**: The top part > Location name > A descriptive name to help users recognize the location.
**vatRegistrationId**: General information tab > Location address section > VAT registration ID > The optional VAT registration ID associated with the location.
**vatZone**: General information tab > Location address section > VAT zone > The VAT zone associated with the account location.
**defaultVatCategory**: Click the magnifier. The Default VAT category for the VAT zone of the supplier, which is specified in the  AP303000 window.
**description**: Click the magnifier. The description for the VAT zone of the supplier, which is specified in the  AP303000 window.
**id**: Click the magnifier. The identifier for the VAT zone of the supplier, which is specified in the  AP303000 window.
